devdoc.author: Smit Rajput
devdoc.details: The contract representing a person who created a bounty on this dapp

acceptSubmission(uint256,uint256).details: To accept a particular submission to a bounty and pay him/her the reward

params.bountyID: The ID of the bounty to which the winning submission belongs
params.subID: The ID of the winning submission Only the bounty-creator can call this function, and that too in the state of no emergency

constructor.details: The constructor to create this contract

createBounty(string,uint256).return: bountyID The ID of the new bounty

createSub(uint256,string).details: To create a submission for a bounty

params.bountyID: The ID of the bounty to submit to

createSub(uint256,string).return: subID The ID of the new submission

getBountyDetails(uint256).details: To receive the complete details of a bounty

params.bountyID: The ID of the bounty to receive the details of

getBountyDetails(uint256).return: All the details of the bounty, corresponding to bountyID

getSubDetails(uint256,uint256).details: To receive the complete details of a submission to a bounty

params.bountyID: The ID of the bounty to which the submission belongs
params.subID: The ID of the submission to receive the details of

getSubDetails(uint256,uint256).return: All the details of the submission corresponding to the bountyID and subID

kill().details: To destroy this contract once the bounty-creator leaves the dapp permanently Only the dapp-owner can call this function

toggleEmergency().details: To change the state of emergency from true to false and vice-versa  Only the owner has the permission to call this function

devdoc.title: BountyCreator
